---
name: Help
about: Ask for help
title: 'Help: ...'
labels: ":pray: help wanted"
assignees:

---

1. What's your OS?

2. What's the version of the program (see at the top of logs)?

3. How are you running the container? (i.e Docker, Docker Compose, Docker Swarm, Kubernetes, etc.)

4. What is the problem?
